actions.in_committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation

official_title: To require the Commandant of the Coast Guard to submit to the Congress a report regarding the appropriateness of using the Coast Guard Training Center at Cape May, New Jersey, as an official site for recognizing the bicentenary of the United States Coast Guard.

summary.text: Directs the Commandant of the Coast Guard to report to the Congress regarding the appropriateness of using the Coast Guard Training Center at Cape May, New Jersey, as an official site for recognizing the bicentenary of the U.S. Coast Guard.

titles.title: To require the Commandant of the Coast Guard to submit to the Congress a report regarding the appropriateness of using the Coast Guard Training Center at Cape May, New Jersey, as an official site for recognizing the bicentenary of the United States Coast Guard.
